Charitable reproof a sermon preached at the Church of St. Mary-le-Bow to the Societies for Reformation of Manners, the 25th of March, 1700 / by the Right Reverend Father in God, Gilbert Lord Bishop of Sarum. Burnet, Gilbert, 1643-1715. Societies for the Reformation of Manners.

Printed for Ri. Chiswell ..., London : 1700.
"Published at the request of the said societies." Reproduction of original in Huntington Library.
